text: Yevgeni Safonov (born 8 December 1985) is a Kazakhstani cross-country skier. He competed in the men's sprint event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Kazakhstani male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Kazakhstan Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:People from Akmola Region
title: Yevgeni Safonov (skier)
